title: Ceremonial Hanging (Palepai)
artistDisplayName:
Paminggir people 
Lampung area, South Sumatra, Indonesia
medium: Cotton, silk, gold-leaf-over-lacquered-paper strip wrapped bast fiber (probably ramie), and silver-leaf-over-lacquered-paper strip wrapped cotton, plain weave with supplementary brocading wefts
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of E. M. Bakwin Indonesian Textile Collection
